snippet: Employers fear that any effort to accelerate such elections will help unions by giving businesses less time to campaign against unionization.
abstract: National Retail Federation and other business groups criticize new rules issued by National Labor Relations Board that have potential to speed up unionization process.
lead_paragraph: Employers fear that any effort to accelerate such elections will help unions by giving businesses less time to campaign against unionization.

headline.main: Labor Board Accelerates Process for Unionization
headline.print_headline: Labor Board Accelerates Process for Unionization
